name: Soul Harvest Inc.
description:
Ludum Dare 52 Entry

A game where you manage a firm of grim reapers that collects souls.  Click the arrow near the bottom of your screen to see a list of your current targets, then find them on the map and click on them to have your reapers go and collect their souls.  Expand your firm by hiring more reapers and reaper interns, as well as purchasing upgrades in the shop tab accessible through the arrow near the top left of the screen.  The amount of souls you've harvested is displayed in the top right corner.

Controls:

  • click on people on the map to harvest their souls
  • click the bottom right arrow to show the target list
  • click the top left arrow to show the upgrades shop

Camera controls:

  • shift -> zoom in
  • ctrl -> zoom out
  • scroll wheel -> zoom
  • WASD -> pan
